summary: Those wacky Bowery Boys invent a super fast fuel, which will help them win an auto race (isn't this cheating?). However, the fuel is stolen by the bad guys just before the big race.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Bernard Gorcey|Robert Lowery|Leon Belasco|Richard Benedict|Jane Easton|Murray Alper|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Tom Hanlon|Mona Knox|George Barrows|John Breen|Conrad Brooks|Tom Coleman|Dude Criswell|Dick Crockett|George Dockstader|George Hoagland|Pete Kellett|Fred Lamont|Carey Loftin|Teddy Mangean|Murray Pollack|Bob Rose|Carl Saxe|Louis Tomei|Bud Wolfe
title: Jalopy
